tidbits.title: Oil Reserves
tidbits.description: Kuwait possesses significant oil reserves, playing a crucial role in its economy and global oil production.

tidbits.title: Rich History and Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich history, seen in its ancient archaeological sites, traditional markets (souks), and historic landmarks.

tidbits.title: Modern Skyline
tidbits.description: Kuwait City boasts a modern skyline with impressive architecture, including the Kuwait Towers and contemporary shopping complexes.
